org.reactfx

Interface TriEventStream<A,B,C>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventStream<Tuple3<A,B,C>>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    InterceptableTriEventStream<A,B,C>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LazilyBoundTriStream, TriEventSource

    public interface TriEventStream<A,B,C>
extends EventStream<Tuple3<A,B,C>>

      • emitOn

        default TriEventStream<A,B,C> emitOn(EventStream<?> impulse)
        Description copied from interface: EventStream
        Returns a new event stream that, when an event arrives from the impulse stream, emits the most recent event emitted by this stream. Each event is emitted at most once. For example, if events are emitted in this order, [i, a, i, b, c, i, i, d], where a, b, c, d come from this stream and is come from the impulse stream, then the returned stream emits [a, c].
        Specified by:
        emitOn in interface EventStream<Tuple3<A,B,C>>

      • emitOnEach

        default TriEventStream<A,B,C> emitOnEach(EventStream<?> impulse)
        Description copied from interface: EventStream
        Returns a new event stream that, when an event arrives from the impulse stream, emits the most recent event emitted by this stream. The same event may be emitted more than once. For example, if events are emitted in this order, [i, a, i, b, c, i, i, d], where a, b, c, d come from this stream and is come from the impulse stream, then the returned stream emits [a, c, c].
        Specified by:
        emitOnEach in interface EventStream<Tuple3<A,B,C>>

      • repeatOn

        default TriEventStream<A,B,C> repeatOn(EventStream<?> impulse)
        Description copied from interface: EventStream
        Returns a new event stream that emits all the events emitted from this stream and in addition to that re-emits the most recent event on every event emitted from impulse.
        Specified by:
        repeatOn in interface EventStream<Tuple3<A,B,C>>

      • interceptable

        default InterceptableTriEventStream<A,B,C> interceptable()
        Specified by:

      • threadBridge

        default TriEventStream<A,B,C> threadBridge(java.util.concurrent.Executor sourceThreadExecutor,
                                           java.util.concurrent.Executor targetThreadExecutor)
        Description copied from interface: EventStream
        Transfers events from one thread to another. Any event stream can only be accessed from a single thread. This method allows to transfer events from one thread to another. Any event emitted by this EventStream will be emitted by the returned stream on a different thread.
        Specified by:
        threadBridge in interface EventStream<Tuple3<A,B,C>>
        Parameters:
        sourceThreadExecutor - executor that executes tasks on the thread from which this EventStream is accessed.
        targetThreadExecutor - executor that executes tasks on the thread from which the returned EventStream will be accessed.
        Returns:
        Event stream that emits the same events as this EventStream, but uses targetThreadExecutor to emit the events.

      • threadBridgeFromFx

        default TriEventStream<A,B,C> threadBridgeFromFx(java.util.concurrent.Executor targetThreadExecutor)
        Description copied from interface: EventStream
        Transfers events from the JavaFX application thread to another thread. Equivalent to threadBridge(Platform::runLater, targetThreadExecutor).
        Specified by:
        threadBridgeFromFx in interface EventStream<Tuple3<A,B,C>>
        Parameters:
        targetThreadExecutor - executor that executes tasks on the thread from which the returned EventStream will be accessed.
        Returns:
        Event stream that emits the same events as this EventStream, but uses targetThreadExecutor to emit the events.
        See Also:
        EventStream.threadBridge(Executor, Executor)

      • threadBridgeToFx

        default TriEventStream<A,B,C> threadBridgeToFx(java.util.concurrent.Executor sourceThreadExecutor)
        Description copied from interface: EventStream
        Transfers events to the JavaFX application thread. Equivalent to threadBridge(sourceThreadExecutor, Platform::runLater).
        Specified by:
        threadBridgeToFx in interface EventStream<Tuple3<A,B,C>>
        Parameters:
        sourceThreadExecutor - executor that executes tasks on the thread from which this EventStream is accessed.
        Returns:
        Event stream that emits the same events as this EventStream, but emits them on the JavaFX application thread.
        See Also:
        EventStream.threadBridge(Executor, Executor)

      • guardedBy

        default TriEventStream<A,B,C> guardedBy(Guardian... guardians)
        Description copied from interface: EventStream
        Returns a clone of this event stream guarded by the given guardians. The returned event stream emits the same events as this event stream. In addition to that, the emission of each event is guarded by the given guardians: before the emission, guards are acquired in the given order; after the emission, previously acquired guards are released in reverse order.
        Specified by:
        guardedBy in interface EventStream<Tuple3<A,B,C>>
